title: Sales forecast for eye care product Restasis in U.S. 2014 to 2025
summary: Overall Sales in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2021, and finally roughly constant from 2021 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Sales in million U.S. dollars, of value 2332.0 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest Sales in million U.S. dollars, of value 1524.0 was reported at Year 2017
